 headlights still work, so I can give ya the light ya need ta work in.  And=

r okay? That's his problem,

=
=93Maybe you can think of getting a beast mode like ours Night Shift.=94
RA=
MULUS joked as he helped NIGHT SHIFT as well. =93We can get over this
rough=
 terrain better than any four wheeled vehicle.=94 With his larger
frame and=
 powerful build able to take the Autobot=92s weight rather
easily.

=93The =
rain must be fall out from the Volcano that erupted from Hydras=92s
old bas=
e.=94 RAMULUS said as he got NIGHT SHIFT into the cave. He
reached into his=
 pack, pulled out a field scanner and ran it over
NIGHT SHIFT=92s wound. =
=93We might get it to heal a little on its own
before we start heading back=
.=94

(TAG)

Preston
